bibl.title: The Archive of Apa Johannes: Notes on a Proposed New Edition.
bibl.note: Introduces a proposal to publish a new edition of the archive of Apa Johannes, the second largest among the fourth-century monastic archives.

bibl.title: Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume I

bibl.seg: CHOAT Malcolm, The Archive of Apa Johannes: Notes on a Proposed New Edition.

Jaakko FRÖSÉN, Tiina PUROLA and Erja SALMENKIVI (Edd.), Proceedings of the 24th International Congress of Papyrology, Helsinki, 1-7 August, 2004. Volume I = Commentationes Humanarum Litterarum. 122, 1, 2007 (Helsinki, 2007) pp. 175-183.
Introduces a proposal to publish a new edition of the archive of Apa Johannes, the second largest among the fourth-century monastic archives.
